name: EMODnet Physics Data Catalog
description: A comprehensive catalog providing in-situ ocean physics data from European and global sources, including key European oceanographic repositories, marine infrastructures, and observational networks such as EuroGOOS, Copernicus Marine Service, SeaDataNet, ICES, PANGAEA, and international programs such as ARGO, IABP, SOOS, DOOS, and GO-SHIP.
owner_name: European Marine Observation and Data Network (EMODnet)
